name: project-08-nftmarketplace-hardhat
description: This project demonstrates NFTMarketplace Powered By Hardhat. NFTMarketplace Project Allows to List, Buy, Cancel, Update and withdraw the Proceeds of NFTs. It provides scripts for deploying, minting, listing, cancelling, updating and withdrawing NFTs and NFTMarketplace, it also comes with a verbose testing script for testing NFTMarketplace.
author: theirrationalone
